name: Valid login credentials
description: Test successful login with valid username and password
expected_result: User successfully logs in and is redirected to dashboard

name: Invalid login credentials
description: Test login failure with invalid credentials
expected_result: Error message is displayed and user remains on login page

name: Valid funds transfer between accounts
description: Test successful money transfer between user accounts
expected_result: Transfer is successful and confirmation is displayed

name: Account balance display
description: Test account balance retrieval and display

name: Generate account statement
description: Test account statement generation for specified date range
expected_result: Statement is generated with correct transactions

name: Detect unusual transaction patterns
description: Test AI-powered fraud detection system for anomalous transactions
steps: Generate test transaction data with known anomalies
Process transactions through fraud detection system

name: Test transaction categorization
steps: Create test transactions with various merchants
expected_result: Transactions are correctly categorized by type
